# Qualifying Datetime

The start of the qualifying session decide the end of the period to submit predictions. In case of a sprint weekend, the qualifying session is the Sprint Qualifying session, so the end of the period to submit predictions is the start of the Sprint Qualifying session.

This datetime defines the countdown for the predictions in the home page and admin panel.

This datetime is retrieved from the OpenF1 API and stored in the database. Or overridden by the admin in case of a delay or update.

### Currently qualifying datetime

> [!NOTE]
> This datetime are detailed based on Spain, Barcelona timezone.
